Name: Save the Pirate: Sea Story
About the game: Save the Pirate! is an adventure game about a funny pirate, containing logic tasks. The main character needs to get out of the dungeon, return his ship and save his beloved. Take part in dangerous adventures with the Hero and determine his fate, but be careful â€“ one wrong choice, and you become a shark bait! The game's storyline contains bonus levels and different options for the walkthrough with references to popular games and movies. The fate of the characters in each chapter and mega final will depend on the decisions of the player made during the game.
